mvp.heading: Frequently Asked Questions
mvp.subtitle: Everything you need to know about MVPBlocks and how to use our components to build your next project quickly.

items.title: What makes MVPBlocks different?
items.content: MVPBlocks is a fully open-source, developer-first component library built using Next.js and TailwindCSS, designed to help you launch your MVPs in record time. No bloated packages, no unnecessary installs—just clean, copyable code to plug right into your next big thing.

items.title: How can I customize the components?
items.content: All components are built with Tailwind CSS, making them highly customizable. Simply modify the class names or use our theme variables to match your brand. Components also support both light and dark modes out of the box.

items.title: Are MVPBlocks components responsive?
items.content: Absolutely! All components are designed to be fully responsive and work beautifully on all devices, from mobile phones to large desktop screens. We've carefully crafted each component to provide an optimal experience regardless of screen size.

items.title: Can I use MVPBlocks for commercial projects?
items.content: Yes, all MVPBlocks components are free to use for both personal and commercial projects. No attribution required—just build and launch your MVP faster than ever before.

items.title: How do I get started with MVPBlocks?
items.content: Simply browse our component library, find the components you need, and copy the code into your project. It's that easy! Our documentation provides clear instructions for installation and usage.

hero.subtitle: Comprehensive wellness packages designed to help you achieve your health and fitness goals

cards.title: Performance Muscle Strengthening & Recovery Package
cards.description: Boost performance and enhance recovery with our comprehensive muscle strengthening program. Includes annual nurse consultations, monthly recovery medications, body composition tracking, and personalized training plans.

cards.title: Transformation Weight Loss Package
cards.description: Metabolic reset & Body composition – Our comprehensive weight loss program includes annual nurse practitioner consultations, monthly GLP1 medications, body scans, 2 week Lingo CMG monitoring (continuous glucose monitor), and personalized training & food plans to help employees achieve their goals.

cards.title: Wellness Package
cards.description: Rebuild/Repair/Revitalize – Invest in long-term health and vitality with our wellness and longevity program. Included are bi-annual nurse visits, monthly peptide medications, a training and food plan, and regular body scans that promote holistic well-being.
